name: mini-plant-store
description: A comprehensive plant e-commerce platform built with MERN stack (MongoDB, Express.js, React, Node.js)

scripts.install-all: npm install && npm install --prefix backend && npm install --prefix frontend
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix backend" "npm run dev --prefix frontend"
scripts.clean: npm run clean --prefix backend && npm run clean --prefix frontend
scripts.prepare-deploy: npm run clean:node_modules && npm run install-all && npm run build

author: Mini Plant Store Team
